images.copyright: Spectral tarsiers in a ficus tree in Tangkoko Batuangus Nature Reserve, Indonesia (© Ondrej Prosicky/Shutterstock)
images.title: All eyes on biodiversity
images.caption: All eyes on biodiversity
images.desc: We don't really need an excuse to celebrate wildlife, but today is the UN's World Wildlife Day. This year's theme is Sustaining all life on Earth, focusing on biodiversity. The UN and its partners are producing a series of programmes and social media activities, including a film festival and an international youth art competition.
